about_the_game:
Strange forces have transformed peaceful animals into haunting monsters.

Grow Your Team is an immersive, action-packed adventure that merges exploration, combat, and character evolution. Traverse vivid landscapes, confront eerie adversaries, and cultivate a team of hybrid characters from the seeds left behind by defeated monsters. With every step, unearth the secrets of this unusual world and challenge the unknown, as you piece together the ultimate truth behind the transformative chaos.

FIGHT MONSTERS and COLLECT SEEDS


Engage in thrilling combat against peculiar creatures, gathering seeds dropped upon their defeat. These seeds hold the key to unlocking unique body parts essential for character customization.

GROW BODY PARTS


Plant collected seeds to cultivate a variety of body parts, each blending human and animal traits. Pig heads, dog legs, and much much more.

BUILD HYBRID CHARACTERS


Mix and match cultivated body parts to assemble a crew of distinct hybrid characters. Experiment with various combinations to craft a team with varied skills and appearances to aid you in battle. Make them not only powerful but also as unique as your imagination.

EXPLORE NEW AREAS and CHALLENGES


Embark on an immersive journey across diverse landscapes, each harboring new enemies and body part possibilities. Explore hidden secrets, confront unique adversaries, and expand your roster of hybrid characters.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may not be suitable for all ages because of blood, and violence in the form of attacking and killing monsters.

Minimum:

short_description: Gather seeds from defeated monsters. Grow random body parts and build unique hybrid characters to assist you in your journey. You will explore new areas along with new enemies and seeds in this action-RPG.

English*, Polish
